name: BOLD Fellowship for Economic Development and Entrepreneurship
description: BOLD Fellowship is an engaging entrepreneurship program comprised of three segments: the Virtual Program, U.S. based program, BiH based program. This intensive academic and practical program provides in-depth training on entrepreneurship and leadership through a combination of classroom and experiential learning. U.S. based program activities are held at the University of Buffalo, New York and New York City, in the duration of one month.
support: U.S. Embassy in Bosnia and Herzegovina, U.S. State Department

name: IEEE Innovation Nation Fellowship
description: IEEE Innovation Nation is a program designed to provide the opportunity to develop a wide range of transferable professional skills such as leadership, effective teamwork, digital literacy, an entrepreneurial mentality, and other similar abilities in parallel to designing an innovative new product based on the Stanford Design Thinking Model. Young professionals are divided into interdisciplinary teams during a 12-week program, consisting of weekly workshops, industry lectures, startup coaching sessions and work on an innovative new product that aligns with a well defined challenge and customer base within their team.
support: La Trobe University (Australia), MIT Legatum Center (US), IEEE Organization
